headline: Reassessing Seagate Technology Holdings (STX) After A 355% One Year Share Price Surge
summary: If you are wondering whether Seagate Technology Holdings shares still offer value after a strong run, this article will walk through what the current price might be implying. The stock closed at US$429.32, with returns of 5.3% over 7 days, 39.3% over 30 days, 49.3% year to date and 355.2% over 1 year, while the 3 year and 5 year returns are both very large. Recent attention on Seagate has been shaped by ongoing interest in data storage demand and company updates that keep investors focused...
